response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's a solution tailored to enhance your life or business significantly. Given its unique features and the high-quality materials used, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its market value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $18,000. This is an opportunity to secure a top-tier product at a competitive price, tailored specifically for someone like you. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 18000}
